channel.title: SUGGESTION: get some donation for this AWESOME Work
channel.description:
I wouldn't say BMS is a Mod, its a full flagedet Game. And its awesome. May be remake but mind blowing.
And its FREE. But their hard work MUST be rewarded.
[b][COLOR='Yellow']IDEA[/b]: Please create a Red Bill's TF2 Hat and sell it for $5. We will all buy and support. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96425812[/url]
This will also help you guyz to build other episodes.

item.title: SUGGESTION: get some donation for this AWESOME Work
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
The devs can’t and won’t take donations since HL is not their intellectual property. If you really want to give money, give it to a charity, they need it more than we do.

Read full topic
item.source: SUGGESTION: get some donation for this AWESOME Work
